titles.title: A bill to designate the United States courthouse located at the intersections of Broad Street, Seventh Street, Grace Street, and Eighth Street in Richmond, Virginia, as the "Spottswood W. Robinson III and Robert Merhige Jr. Courthouse".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 9/29/2006--Introduced. Designates the United States courthouse, located at the intersection of Broad Street, Seventh Street, Grace Street, and Eighth Street in Richmond, Virginia, as the "Spottswood W. Robinson III and Robert Merhige Jr .Courthouse."
